description: This file defines the main page component for a note-taking web application. It manages state related to notes, handles fetching and manipulating notes via imported API functions, and renders UI components for editing, viewing, creating, and deleting notes.

methods.name: handleCreate
methods.description: Creates a new note with the title 'Untitled', updates the notes state, sets it as active, and switches to edit mode.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes the currently active note, updates the notes list, and adjusts the active note accordingly.

methods.name: handleUpdate
methods.description: Updates the active note with new content or title, optimistically updates the UI, and persists changes via the API.
